name: MyAnime Widget
author: Regios

sections.description:
The MyAnime widget leverages the engine of the MyAnime.me social fansub monitoring site to display the latest fansubbed anime episodes on your blog in a highly configurable fashion.

If you have a MyAnime user account, you can define the series that you wish to follow there, and have only episodes from them displayed in your MyAnime widget.

The widget is still in a somewhat beta state. If you have any trouble installing or using it, do not hesitate to contact us at support@myanime.me.
sections.installation:
1. Upload myanime.php and myanime_import_admin.php to the /wp-content/plugins/myanime directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Select location for the plugin under Appearance > Widgets
  4. Customize plugin look through Settings > MyAnime
  5. (Optional) Get a MyAnime.me user account and specify it in settings to get a customized feed

short_description: Displays the latest fansubbed anime episodes with a graphical icon.
